target.name: help
target.echo:
###################### PARAMETERS ######################################
-Denv= - set environment. Default value is "dev". -Ddebug= - display task result (phpcs and phpmd) on the screen instead of write to file. Default value is "true".
###################### SYMFONY TASKS ###################################
build.db - build database (drop, create, load fixtures) for given environment.
cc - clear cache, dump assets for dev and prod environment.
###################### TESTING #########################################
phpunit - execute phpunit tests with code coverage report. Result is saved into test_result directory.
###################### CODING STANDARDS ################################
phpcs - run PHP_CodeSniffer to check conding standards.
phpmd - execute PHPMD checkstyle reports.
